title: [GAMEPLAY] Jhin q not bouncing
body:
In game recently I have noticed that Jhins q doesn't always bounce up to four targets, at first I thought it could have been out of range but I notice it happens even when minions are right next to each other, this bug occurs fairly often but I don't know how to force it to happen. from what I have seen if it does glitch it always bounces twice, no more no less. If you could look into it that would be great.

Thanks :)

replies.body: As LostFrost mentioned, we're looking to get a fix in ASAP! Thanks for your patience!
Oh ok sorry for bringing it up

Riot is aware of the bug and working on it~
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/jQYaup3c-gameplay-hn-jhin-q-bounce-only-twice?comment=0001
